SpiderBoi(SpiderBoiSkin) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.boi.SpiderBoi
The constructor for the SpiderBoi object, calls the parent constructor, initialises the speed of the SpiderBoi, initialises the image of the SpiderBoi in all four directions, and creates an ArrayList to get the stopping locations on the obstacles.
